data.title: Campus Tours
data.meta_description: Book onto our campus tour and let one of students take you on a tour around our most iconic buildings at the University. Our Postgraduate tours also include visits to our many research institutes.
data.text:
Book now

Please use the booking form on this webpage to secure your place.

Offer holders

If you're holding a UCAS offer from us, keep an eye out for an email invite to one of our undergraduate Offer Holder Experience Days.

You will get chance to learn about our range of Student Services, undertake a campus tour and discover more about your chosen subject.

Further opportunities

Unable to attend on any of the dates? Why not undertake a Self Guided Campus Tour or sign up for one of our upcoming Open Days instead?

Get in touch

If you have any queries about campus tours, we'd be happy to help.

Keeping you safe

We keep our tour groups small to ensure that you receive a more interactive experience. This allows you to ask your tour guide any questions you may have. We request that additional guest numbers are indicated at booking stage, where possible, to assist with our planning.

A large proportion of the tour is outdoors. There are a couple of indoor elements to view some of our facilities. Face coverings are optional on campus. We have hand sanitiser at various locations around campus.
